channel.title: Comments on: Understanding How Kuri Speaks
channel.description: Meet Kuri, the adorable home robot.

item.title: By: Jennifer
item.dc:creator: Jennifer
item.description: Hi Alexander - Hope all is well with you too! To answer your questions, Kuri is 20 inches tall, 12 inches wide, and weighs about 14 pounds. You can play Pandora through Kuri via your smartphone's Bluetooth settings. Lastly, Kuri comes with a one-year limited warranty (standard for most consumer electronics products). For more information about Kuri, I recommend checking out our Kuri's Top FAQs blog post: https://blog.heykuri.com/kuris-top-10-faqs/
item.content:encoded: Hi Alexander – Hope all is well with you too! To answer your questions, Kuri is 20 inches tall, 12 inches wide, and weighs about 14 pounds. You can play Pandora through Kuri via your smartphone’s Bluetooth settings. Lastly, Kuri comes with a one-year limited warranty (standard for most consumer electronics products). For more information about Kuri, I recommend checking out our Kuri’s Top FAQs blog post: https://blog.heykuri.com/kuris-top-10-faqs/

item.description: Hi Jennifer hope all is well What are the measurements of Kury And can’t Kuri play pandora just like Alexa app? What is something goes wrong whit Kuri what is the guarantee?

item.title: By: Jennifer
item.dc:creator: Jennifer
item.description: Hi Jomabd - Kuri charges herself! More information here: https://blog.heykuri.com/kuri-update/
item.content:encoded: Hi Jomabd – Kuri charges herself! More information here: https://blog.heykuri.com/kuri-update/

item.title: By: Jomabd
item.dc:creator: Jomabd
item.description: Can Kuri charge herself??? Like is you say “hey Kuri go charge “ will she??
item.content:encoded: Can Kuri charge herself??? Like is you say “hey Kuri go charge “ will she??

item.title: By: Jennifer
item.dc:creator: Jennifer
item.description: Hi Derek, Our team is still working on developing an Android compatible version of the Kuri Robot App which will be available for download from the Google Play store in the near future. We're also still working on an IFTTT integration - stay tuned! :)
item.content:encoded: Hi Derek, Our team is still working on developing an Android compatible version of the Kuri Robot App which will be available for download from the Google Play store in the near future. We’re also still working on an IFTTT integration – stay tuned! 🙂

item.title: By: Derek
item.dc:creator: Derek
item.description:
Early during Kuri's development, there was an announcement that she would be compatible with IFTTT - is that still underway? Also, are there any plans to launch a Kuri app compatible with android?
Thanks for answering our questions! We are excited to receive our home robot this summer!
item.content:encoded:
Early during Kuri’s development, there was an announcement that she would be compatible with IFTTT – is that still underway? Also, are there any plans to launch a Kuri app compatible with android?

Thanks for answering our questions! We are excited to receive our home robot this summer!

item.title: By: Jennifer
item.dc:creator: Jennifer
item.description: Hi Brian! Depending on when you ordered your Kuri, you'll most likely receive it between June 15th and July 30th. Woo-hoo! If you have any additional questions about your order, you can contact our Kuri Experience team at support@heykuri.com.
item.content:encoded: Hi Brian! Depending on when you ordered your Kuri, you’ll most likely receive it between June 15th and July 30th. Woo-hoo! If you have any additional questions about your order, you can contact our Kuri Experience team at support@heykuri.com.

item.title: By: Brian Landes
item.dc:creator: Brian Landes
item.description: When can I expect my Kuri? Is there an expected arrival date?
item.content:encoded: When can I expect my Kuri? Is there an expected arrival date?
